description:
Cozy, sunny, minimalistic apartment smack in the HEART of Williamsburg, Brooklyn! 250 feet from the popular L train. 6 minute ride into manhattan. Walking distance to everything you could possibly need. Incredible food, shopping, bars, etc.

L train is 250 feet from the house. If you opt to stay in williamsburg you can walk just about ANYWHERE!
name: Beautiful 1BR apartment in the HEART of Brooklyn!!
